select la.id,la.user_id,la.luck_id,la.is_winning, lp.id as price_id,lp.luck_prize,lp.num,lp.luck_pic, u.user_name,u.headimgurl from luck_actor as la LEFT JOIN luck_draw as ld on ld.id=la.luck_id LEFT JOIN luck_prize as lp on la.prize_id=lp.id LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=la.user_id where la.id = #{luckId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND la.is_winning = 1 order by id desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select la.id,la.user_id,la.luck_id,la.is_winning, u.user_name,u.headimgurl from luck_actor as la LEFT JOIN luck_draw as ld on ld.id=la.luck_id LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=la.user_id where la.luck_id = #{luckId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select la.id,la.user_id,la.luck_id,la.is_winning, u.user_name,u.headimgurl from luck_actor as la LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=la.user_id where la.luck_id = #{luckId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND la.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

select u.user_name,u.headimgurl, ld.id,ld.user_id,ld.luck_name,ld.luck_pic,ld.luck_explain,ld.lottery_time,ld.status,ld.luck_mode,ld.gmt_created from luck_draw as ld LEFT JOIN `user` as u ON u.school_num=ld.user_id LEFT JOIN luck_actor as la ON ld.id=la.luck_id where ld.is_examine = 1 AND la.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by ld.id desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select count(*) from luck_actor where user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND is_winning = 1

select lp.id,lp.luck_prize,lp.num,lp.luck_pic,lp.sponsor,lp.luck_draw_id,lp.gmt_created from luck_prize as lp LEFT JOIN luck_actor as la ON la.prize_id=lp.id where la.user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=BIGINT} AND la.is_winning = 1 order by lp.luck_draw_id desc limit #{startPos,jdbcType=INTEGER},#{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}

select t1.id,t1.user_id,t1.luck_id,t1.is_winning,t1.prize_id FROM `luck_actor` AS t1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * ((SELECT MAX(id) FROM `luck_actor`)-(SELECT MIN(id) FROM `luck_actor`))+(SELECT MIN(id) FROM `luck_actor`)) AS id) AS t2 WHERE t1.id >= t2.id AND is_winning = 0 limit 1
mapper.update: update luck_actor set is_winning = #{isWinning,jdbcType=INTEGER}, prize_id = #{prizeId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, gmt_modified = NOW() where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT} order by id desc limit 1
